songs.title: Used to This (Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Zaytoven
Beast Mode
I love bein' in the studio, know what I'm sayin'?

[Pre-Chorus]
Mexicano, working like I'm Mexicano
New persona, we're moving on from Ferragamo (I'm movin' on)
Get the llama, I party with the real Madonna (yeah)
Beat the odds, do numbers and remain humble (Future)

[Chorus]
Drop-top Porsches, I'm so used to this (yeah)
Smoking out the pound, I'm so used to this (swear)
I know where I'm from and I got used to this
Mansion in the hills, I got used to this (Future)

[Verse 1]
Stack of booty bitches, I got used to this (woo)
There's Iceland in my wrist, I done got used to this
Tropicana bitches, I got all kinda flavors
Selling dope all my life, I can't do minimum wage (nah)
Dirty-dirty money, I got used to this (gang)
I give you my whole heart 'til there ain't nothing to give (Future)
You know how far we came if you know where we been
(Freebandz)
How many niggas you know can hop in the Benz? (woo)
Be honest to yourself, don't you never pretend (tell 'em)
Don't ever play yourself, know when it all begins (you know)
I had to put my back against the wall (and what?)
Tell me that I don't deserve to ball

[Pre-Chorus]
Mexicano, working like I'm Mexicano
New persona, we're moving on from Ferragamo
Get the llama, I party with the real Madonna
Beat the odds, do numbers and remain humble (yeah)

[Chorus]
Drop-top Porsches, I'm so used to this (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Smoking out the pound, I'm so used to this (ugh)
I know where I'm from and I got used to this
Mansion in the hills, I got used to this

[Verse 2]
All-black diamonds on my fingers like a widow
Had to ball my shirt up, I used to use it for a pillow
Everday I stay down late, John Lenno'
Come through, paper plays, all the presidentials
Molly and codeine, I got used to this
Caught a rockstar life and I got used to this
Thinkin' I'ma fail if I give up on this
If I start takin' these drugs, I won't make me a hit
I get so much money, I can't listen to this
I can't slow down on these pills, they feel too good to quit
Need to practice what I preach, I done got used to this
I can't get caught up with fame, it ain't no more to trick

[Pre-Chorus]
Mexicano, working like I'm Mexicano
New persona, we're moving on from Ferragamo (I'm movin' on)
Get the llama, I party with the real Madonna (yeah)
Beat the odds, do numbers and remain humble (Future)

[Chorus]
Drop-top Porsches, I'm so used to this (yeah)
Smoking out the pound, I'm so used to this (swear)
I know where I'm from and I got used to this (ayy)
Mansion in the hills, I got used to this

[Outro]
Be honest to yourself, don't you never pretend
Don't ever play yourself, know where it all begins
I had put my back against the wall
Tell me that I don't deserve to ball
